Class SoundLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • SoundLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, javax.sound.sampled.LineListener

    public class SoundLoader
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.sound.sampled.LineListener
    Loads the sounds to be played from the zombies, firetraps, and player sprites

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SoundLoader(java.lang.String path)
      Loads in a sound file from directory and makes it into a sound clip.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void loadSounds()
      loads the sounds from specific files in are repository
      static void playBite()
      Makes sounds for when zombie bites player
      static void playerRun()
      Plays the run sound on a loop.
      static void playerWalk()
      Plays the walk sound on a loop.
      static void playExplosion()
      Plays explosion sound when called.
      static void playHitObst()
      Plays hit sound with a current balance of zero.
      static void playHitObst(float balance)
      Plays sounds for zombie hitting obstacles.
      void playLooped()
      Plays audio clip over and over until stopped.
      static void playScream()
      Makes sounds for when zombie bites player
      static void playZWalk()
      Plays zombie walk with a current balance of zero.
      static void playZWalk(float balance)
      Plays zombie walk sound.
      void setBalance(float value)
      Sets the balance which corresponds to a certain speaker.
      void stop()
      Tells clip to stop playing.
      static void stopMoving()
      Stops player sounds from playing when standing still.
      static void stopSounds()
      Stops all sounds.
      void update(javax.sound.sampled.LineEvent event)

        public static void playExplosion()
        Plays explosion sound when called. Has to restart to begging frame in order to make it play multiple times.

        public static void playHitObst(float balance)
        Plays sounds for zombie hitting obstacles. Also gets balance and plays it on certain speaker.
        Parameters:
        balance -

        public static void playZWalk(float balance)
        Plays zombie walk sound.
        Parameters:
        balance - which speaker it should be played from.

      • setBalance

        public void setBalance(float value)
        Sets the balance which corresponds to a certain speaker.
        Parameters:
        value - 0, 1, or -1

      • stop

        Tells clip to stop playing.

      • stopMoving

        public static void stopMoving()
        Stops player sounds from playing when standing still.

      • stopSounds

        public static void stopSounds()
        Stops all sounds. Usefull for pause game and restart.
